text:
Write the conditional, converse, inverse, and contrapositive of the statement ex

Conditional If [imath] \mathbf{p}, [/imath] then [imath] \mathbf{q} [/imath]\nInverse If [imath] \sim \mathbf{p}, [/imath] then [imath] \sim \mathbf{q} [/imath]\nConverse If [imath] q, [/imath] then [imath] p [/imath]\nContrapositive If [imath] \sim q, [/imath] then [imath] \sim p [/imath]
